article.title: Telephonics Receives Contract from Air Force for Wireless Intercommunication Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Telephonics Corporation has been awarded a contract from the U.S. Air Force in excess of $6 million for TruLink wireless intercommunication systems. The TruLink system will be used by five-member aeromedical evacuation teams to provide clear voice communications between team members, thereby enhancing the safe transport and care of patients onboard military aircraft.
